preferences.main_subtitle_text: This update requires your device to restart
preferences.main_title_text: Action Required - Your device requires a security update
preferences.paragraph1_text: Your Houzz issued device requires a fully up-to-date operating system to ensure that IT can accurately protect your device.
preferences.paragraph2_text: As soon as you are able, please save and back up your work and install updates.
preferences.paragraph3_text: If you have any questions, submit a ticket at https://toolbox.houzz.com/support/home.
preferences.paragraph_title_text:
Urgent Update Required

Please click the “How To Update?” link on the bottom left for a Toolbox article with a video and instructions how to proceed with the update or upgrade.
